attributes.action: Stop the Commemorative 0.50p Coin for Leaving the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The 50p Commemorative Coin for leaving the European Union was announced as part of Budget on the 29.10.18.
attributes.background: The idea to have 50p Commemorative Coin for leaving the EU, is an insensitive idea given that 48% of the people who voted and an increasing number of people in the United Kingdom do not support Brexit and would not want to commemorate it. This idea rubs salt into a very open wound.

rejection.details:
Coins are manufactured and issued by the Royal Mint, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You can find out more here: https://www.royalmint.com/discover/uk-coins/coin-design-and-specifications/.
